Title: Once Again
Writer: Adoor Gopalakrishnan (story), Adoor Gopalakrishnan, Adoor Gopalakrishnan
Actors: Dileep, Kavya Madhavan, Subodh Bhave, Nedumudi Venu
Plot: Purushothaman Nair is jobless while his wife Devi is a teacher and they have a daughter. Movie speaks about love, romance and about the bond between family members.
